vlive.korean: 악마 뭐야 누가 계속 써 악마! Who is it? Who keeps using the devil? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: Who is it? Who keeps using the devil?

vlive.korean: 야 악마 그만 써라 악마 - 그만 때려라! Stop using the devil! - Stop hitting me! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: Stop using the devil! - Stop hitting me!

vlive.korean: [나도 있다, 악마!] 나와! [I have the devil, too!] Get out! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: [I have the devil, too!] Get out!

vlive.korean: [왜 이렇게 악마가 많아?!] 악마 누가 계속 써 악마! [Why are there so many devils?] Who keeps using the devil? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: [Why are there so many devils?] Who keeps using the devil?

vlive.korean: [하필 커브를 돌 때 악마가 풀려버림] 뭐야 이거! [The devil left when he was making a curve] What? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: [The devil left when he was making a curve] What?

examples.korean: the old Enemy 발음듣기 악마. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
He was handsome, with a devilish charm. 발음듣기 그는 잘생기고 악마적인 매력이 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was handsome, with a devilish charm. 발음

examples.korean: You sly old devil! How long have you known? 발음듣기 이 음흉한 늙은 악마 같으니라구! 당신은 안 지 얼마나 된 거야? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You sly old devil! How long have you known? 발음

examples.korean: He’s a crafty old devil. 발음듣기 그는 교활한 악마 같은 늙은이야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s a crafty old devil. 발음

examples.korean: He was demonized by the right-wing press. 발음듣기 그는 우익 언론에서 악마 취급을 당했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was demonized by the right-wing press. 발음
